availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Aaron G. Scott (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Caldwell County, Kentucky, native. Son of Stallard Scott. Married to Martha W. Pickering Scott in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on November 14, 1844. Father of William C. Scott, Malachi Scott, Elvira P. Scott, Erastus Louisa Scott, Stallard Scott, Joseph Ann Scott, Mary A. Scott, and R. L. Scott. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 356B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 34.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 489A.
"Erastus Louisa 'Lou' Scott Wormelduff (1852-1938)," Find A Grave, Memorial # 36178948, accessed March 17, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/36178948.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #27699.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 256.
